main_definition: Branches can refer to the parts of a tree that grow out from its trunk or to divisions within an organization, among other meanings.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Parts of a tree extending from the main stem
meanings_and_examples.example: The old oak tree had many strong branches that reached out in all directions.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Divisions or departments within an organization
meanings_and_examples.example: She works in one of the marketing branches, which focuses on promoting our products to young adults.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Alternative paths or options available from a situation
meanings_and_examples.example: When faced with different job offers, she considered all possible branches before making her decision.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Copying or duplication of content (in the context of computing and digital media)
meanings_and_examples.example: Please make sure not to branch out your files without permission, as it may lead to unauthorized copies.
